Version 2.0.99 - Whole-Activity Tagging for All Activity Types

New Feature

  • Enable tagging comments to any activity type: page, resource, URL, assignment, forum, folder, glossary, wiki, choice, feedback, survey, chat, workshop, LTI, H5P, and any custom activity type
  • Activities without position tracking (e.g., page, resource) report position 1/1 via postMessage for whole-activity tagging
  • New get_whole_activity_script() method in tracking_js class for activities that don't have multiple positions
